typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Año} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as string,
		{Cantidad de productos} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> saBRANDORDERS
source(output(
		{Año} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as decimal(15,2),
		{Cantidad de productos} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dboBRANDORDERS
saBRANDORDERS, dboBRANDORDERS join(saBRANDORDERS@{Año} == dboBRANDORDERS@{Año}
	&& saBRANDORDERS@Marca == dboBRANDORDERS@Marca,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Combinacion1
Combinacion1 alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(saBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&!isNull(saBRANDORDERS@Marca)&&isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@Marca)),
	deleteIf(isNull(saBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&isNull(saBRANDORDERS@Marca)&&!isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&!isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@Marca))) ~> Modificarfila1
